com.innowhere.jnieasy.core
Class JNIEasyWin32Exception

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.JNIEasyException
                  com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.JNIEasyNativeException
                      com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.JNIEasyWin32Exception
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JNIEasyWin32Exception
extends JNIEasyNativeException

JNIEasyWin32Exception is the JNIEasyNativeException derived class thrown from native code on Win32. The native part of JNIEasy catches any type of native exceptions (calling native methods or accessing native memory), gets their exception code (using Win32's GetExceptionCode()) showing what type of error happened, and throws a JNIEasyWin32Exception exception, avoiding a JVM crash.

Author:
Jose M. Arranz Santamaria
See Also:
